action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This joint resolution nullifies the rule submitted by the Bureau of Land Management titled "Onshore Oil and Gas Operations; Federal and Indian Oil and Gas Leases; Measurement of Oil."The rule published in the Federal Register on November 17, 2016, addresses onshore oil and gas operations and production.
